summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4152 for the improvement of North and West 76th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to 3rd Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49646, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
